    Methods in com.epam.facultative.model.service with parameters of type AppContext
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    AdminService.courseLaunchNewsLetter(CourseDTO courseDTO, AppContext appContext)
    Calls EmailSender to launch newsletter
    ByteArrayOutputStream
    GeneralService.downloadAllCoursesInPdf(String locale, AppContext appContext)
    Calls PdfCreator to create pdf
    ByteArrayOutputStream
    StudentService.downloadCertificate(StudentDTO studentDTO, int courseId, int grade, AppContext appContext)
    Calls PdfCreator to create pdf
    void
    GeneralService.recoveryPassword(String email, AppContext appContext)
    Calls EmailSender to send new password and calls DAO to update User with new password
    void
    StudentService.sendCertificate(StudentDTO studentDTO, int courseId, int grade, AppContext appContext)
    Calls EmailSender to launch newsletter and PdfCreator to create pdf

  • Uses of AppContext in com.epam.facultative.model.service.implementation

    Methods in com.epam.facultative.model.service.implementation with parameters of type AppContext
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    AdminServiceImpl.courseLaunchNewsLetter(CourseDTO courseDTO, AppContext appContext)
    Gets CourseDTO and AppContext from action and calls DAO to search students by course.
    ByteArrayOutputStream
    GeneralServiceImpl.downloadAllCoursesInPdf(String locale, AppContext appContext)
    Gets locale and AppContext from action and calls DAO to get relevant entities and count rows.
    ByteArrayOutputStream
    StudentServiceImpl.downloadCertificate(StudentDTO studentDTO, int courseId, int grade, AppContext appContext)
    Gets studentDTO,courseId, grade and AppContext from action and calls DAO to get relevant entity.
    void
    GeneralServiceImpl.recoveryPassword(String email, AppContext appContext)
    Gets email and AppContext from action and calls DAO to get relevant entity and count rows.
    void
    StudentServiceImpl.sendCertificate(StudentDTO studentDTO, int courseId, int grade, AppContext appContext)
    Gets studentDTO,courseId, grade and AppContext from action and calls DAO to get relevant entity.
